title: PRESS RELEASE: DECLARATION OF STATUS
text:
18:42 CET PRESS RELEASE: DECLARATION OF STATUS By Ghana FA 
The following players and club officials are requested to appear before the GFA Players' Status Committee at the FA's Secretariat on Thursday 22nd October, 2015 at 1:00 pm. 
C306 :ABRAHAM ANANG - ACCRA GREAT OLYMPICS FCC311 : NEW TOWN YOUTH FC - ADUANA STARS FCC312: ANKARA SPORTING CLUB - NEW EDUBIASE FCC320: AMIDAUS PROFS/ DANIEL GORZA/ CUDJOE MENSAH/ DREAMS FC/ BOTWEY YOUTH FC 
C333: YUSIF ALI - BEREKUM CHELSEA FCC335: BISMARK IDAN - NEW EDUBIASE UNITED FCC342: TANKO ISSAKA - REAL ATHLETICOC349: KWABENA TWUMASI - ABUSUA DWARFS SCC357 : ELIASU MOHAMMED - AMIDAUS PROFESSIONALC358: RICHARD YEBOAH - DANBORT F.CC359 :RICHARD ASIAMAH MENSAH - ALHABIBI F.CC360 :ERIC BOAKYE - KING FAISAL F.CC361: EMMANUEL GYAMFI - WA ALL STARSC362: PATRICK GYAMFI - LEOZY F.CC363: ABDUL-MAJEED TANKO - OKWAHU F.CC364: AMIDU KARIM - DYNAMITE F.CC365: ERIC ODURO - DEPORTIVO F.CC366: ALHAJI NJE - KESSBEN ACADEMYC367: ALHASSAN ABDUL-SALAM - GUAN UTDC368: RICHMOND ANSAH - UNITY F.CC369: BENJAMIN LARTEY - ACTIVE F.CC370: BENJAMIN SAKA - SPORTING MIRREN F.CC371: MICHEAL EDEM YEBOAH - UNIC F.CC372: EMMANUEL KUMAH - AMIDAUS F.CC373: ABDUL RAHMAN MOHAMMED - LIBERTY F.C
